description: This file contains Pydantic models for API request/response schemas related to test case management, including import previews, suite listings, and test case listings.

classes.name: ImportPreviewRow
classes.description: Model representing a preview row for test case import, including fields like suite name, case ID, title, description, priority, category, subcategory, preconditions, steps, expected result, and tags.

classes.name: ImportTestPlanResponse
classes.description: Model representing the response for test plan import, including counts of created suites and test cases, skipped duplicates, warnings, and preview list.

classes.name: SuiteListItem
classes.description: Model representing a suite with its ID, name, creation timestamp, and number of test cases.

classes.name: SuitesListResponse
classes.description: Model representing a response containing a list of suite items.

classes.name: TestCaseListItem
classes.description: Model representing a summarized test case with fields like ID, suite ID, case ID, title, priority, category, subcategory, and creation timestamp.

classes.name: TestCasesPageResponse
classes.description: Model representing a paginated response of test case items, total count, current page, page size, and applied filters.

ctags.name: ImportPreviewRow
ctags.pattern: /^class ImportPreviewRow(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: ImportTestPlanResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class ImportTestPlanResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: SuiteListItem
ctags.pattern: /^class SuiteListItem(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: SuitesListResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class SuitesListResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TestCaseListItem
ctags.pattern: /^class TestCaseListItem(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TestCasesPageResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class TestCasesPageResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: case_id
ctags.pattern: /^    case_id: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Imported test case identifier.")$/

ctags.pattern: /^    category: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Category\/test area.")$/

ctags.name: category
ctags.pattern: /^    category: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Category\/test area.")$/

ctags.name: created_at
ctags.pattern: /^    created_at: datetime = Field(..., description="Creation timestamp (UTC).")$/

ctags.name: created_at
ctags.pattern: /^    created_at: datetime = Field(..., description="Creation timestamp (UTC).")$/

ctags.name: description
ctags.pattern: /^    description: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Optional description.")$/

ctags.pattern: /^    expected_result: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Expected result\/outcome.")$/

ctags.pattern: /^    filters: Any = Field(..., description="Echo of applied filters.")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: int = Field(..., description="Suite database id.")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: int = Field(..., description="Test case database id.")$/

ctags.name: items
ctags.pattern: /^    items: List[TestCaseListItem] = Field(..., description="Page items.")$/

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^    name: str = Field(..., description="Suite name.")$/

ctags.name: page
ctags.pattern: /^    page: int = Field(..., description="1-based page number.")$/

ctags.name: page_size
ctags.pattern: /^    page_size: int = Field(..., description="Page size.")$/

ctags.name: preconditions
ctags.pattern: /^    preconditions: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Preconditions\/prerequisites.")$/

ctags.pattern: /^    preview: List[ImportPreviewRow] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Preview of first /

ctags.name: priority
ctags.pattern: /^    priority: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Priority label, e.g. P0\/P1.")$/

ctags.name: priority
ctags.pattern: /^    priority: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Priority label.")$/

ctags.name: steps
ctags.pattern: /^    steps: Optional[List[str]] = Field(None, description="List of step strings (best-effort).")$/
